translations: （在法律上）有责任的，有义务的；负有偿付责任的；很可能会发生的；有……倾向的

sentences.sentence: You will be liable for any damage caused.
sentences.translation: 你必须对造成的任何损失负赔偿责任。

sentences.sentence: Offenders are liable to fines of up to $500.
sentences.translation: 违者可能被处以最多500元的罚款。

sentences.sentence: The bridge is liable to collapse at any moment.
